law.text:
The application and plan of reorganization submitted to the commissioner shall demonstrate that:
Policyholder interests are properly preserved and protected;
The plan is fair and equitable to policyholders; and
The financial condition of the applicant will not be diminished.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1495, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 546, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1998.
